front.title: Mathematical Mesh 3.0 Part VI: Reliable Datagram Protocol

abstract.t: A presentation layer suitable for use in conjunction with HTTP and UDP transports is described. https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/mathmesh/ (http://whatever)Discussion of this draft should take place on the MathMesh mailing list (mathmesh@ietf.org), which is archived at .
